review: Received the chromecast as a Christmas present and at first didn't think we would use very often since we usually watched netflix through the Wii.  Had a few issues when installing (all user error and customer service was super nice) and found that it has become our main source of "casting".  A little disapointed that I can't cast everything to the tv but really, it was never advertised that way!  Love that once Netflix is playing we are free to use other apps.
